titles.title: To authorize salary adjustments for Justices and judges of the United States for fiscal year 2007.
To authorize salary adjustments for Justices and judges of the United States for fiscal year 2007.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Courts, the Internet, and Intellectual Property.
Mr. Sensenbrenner moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 5454.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

committee.name: House Judiciary
committee.subcommittee: Courts, Intellectual Property, and the Internet

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Authorizes salary adjustments for Justices and judges of the United States for FY2007.
